Name: Rahyan
title: How to get your first job as a self-taught programmer
description: Breaking into the tech industry without a formal degree can be challenging. This guide provides actionable steps, resources, and strategies to help self-taught programmers land their first job.

Name: Shamsi
title: Mastering JavaScript: Tips and Best Practices
description: JavaScript is one of the most versatile programming languages. This article covers best practices, tips, and techniques to write clean, efficient, and maintainable JavaScript code.

Name: Akil
title: The Roadmap to Becoming a Full-Stack Developer
description: Want to become a full-stack developer? This roadmap outlines the essential skills, technologies, and learning paths required to master both frontend and backend development.

Name: Shamim
title: Building Scalable Applications with Node.js
description: Node.js is a powerful runtime for building scalable applications. This article explores key concepts like asynchronous programming, microservices, and performance optimization for Node.js applications.
